mapper.insert: insert into member1(id, pass, name, age, email, phone) values( #{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{phone} )
insert into member1(id, pass, name, age, email, phone, filename) values( #{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{filename} )
mapper.update: update member1 set age=#{age}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select name from member1 where id = #{id} and pass=#{pass}
select id from member1 where id = #{id}
